original_text: He must also give other loaves of bread to God. He must make these with flour, oil and yeast.
korean_text: 또 유교병을 화목제의 감사제물과 함께 그 예물로 드리되

sentences.original_text: He must also give other loaves of bread to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 다른 빵들을 하나님께 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must make these with flour
